statements: DELETE FROM smart_contracts WHERE is_active = TRUE;
DELETE FROM smart_contracts WHERE creation_date < '2022-01-01' AND is_active = FALSE
DELETE FROM contract_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Payment' AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_address = '0x123456789abcdef' AND deploy_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM contract_transactions WHERE amount > 10000 AND transaction_date > '2021-12-31';
DELETE FROM contract_transitions WHERE contract_id = '456e7890-f12c-34d5-b678-521787920001' AND from_state = 'Pending';
